= Introduction =

Mesh4x FeedSync server that supports RESTfull API to synchonize data with uploaded feed through the basic HTTP GET and POST method.

Current implementation in java can be download from Mesh4xDownloads section.

Test server is hosted on http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x

= Details =

== Get protocol ==
 * feed rss20 with all mesh groups in the server: http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds

 * feed rss20 with all dataset in mesh group Epiinfo http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo

 * rdfxml of Oswego dataset schema(Oswego table structure expressed as RDF http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego/schema

 * XForm of Oswego dataset generated from Oswego rdf schema http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego/schema?content=xform

 * Xml mappings of Oswego dataset http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego/mappings

 * feed rss20, each item is a Oswego dataset patient with payload as rdf http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego	

 * feed rss20, each item is a Oswego dataset patient with payload as rdf http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?format=rss20

 * feed atom10, each item is a Oswego dataset patient with payload as rdf http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?format=atom10	

 * kml, each placemark is a Oswego dataset patient, rdf schema and mappings are used to translate placemarks title and geo lat/lon data http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?format=kml	
	
 * feed rss20, each item is a Oswego dataset patient with payload as xform instance (translated from rdf schema) http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?content=xform	

 * feed rss20, each item is a Oswego dataset patient with payload as xform instance (translated from rdf schema) without feedSync information http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?content=plain_xform	

 * feed rss20, each item is a Oswego dataset patient with payload as plain xml instance (translated from rdf schema) without feedSync information http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?content=plain_xml	

 * feed rss20, each item is a Oswego dataset patient that Country attribute is equals to 'Argentine', payload as rdf instance http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?filter=Country=Argentine
	
 * feed rss20, each item is a history change of Oswego dataset patient information for the item with syncId equals to '1234' http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego/history?syncId=1234	


== Combinations are supported ==
 * feed atom10, each item is a Oswego dataset patient where Country attribute is equals to 'Argentine' and is patient ill attribute is equals to true, payload as xform instance (translated from rdf schema) {{{http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?format=atom10&content=xform&filter=Country=Argentine and Ill=true}}}
